EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at JAX 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}} {{lead.Last Name:default=}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at JAX. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to talk to us about arranging a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-jax-germany-q218]]> to begin a discussion.
Need some dev/test or CI environments? Try running Spring Boot on our public Cloud Foundry instance, Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring]]>, a platform engineered for Spring Boot.
In the meantime, start your Cloud-Native Journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-jax-germany-q218]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-jax-germany-q218]]>, why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Download and read free chapters of Cloud-Native Java <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-jax-germany-q218]]>, by Josh Long and Kenny Bastani.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Refactoring to a System of Systems <[[https://jax.de/software-architecture/refactoring-to-a-system-of-systems/]]> - Spring Framework 5: Feature Highlights and Hidden Gems <[[https://jax.de/serverside-enterprise-java/spring-framework-5-feature-highlights-and-hidden-gems/]]> - Reactive Spring <[[https://jax.de/serverside-enterprise-java/montag-08-05-2017-reactive-spring/]]> - Bootiful Testing <[[https://jax.de/devops-continuous-delivery/bootiful-testing/]]> - 15 Years of Spring: Evolving a Java Application Framework <[[https://jax.de/serverside-enterprise-java/15-years-of-spring-evolving-a-java-application-framework/]]> - Was gibts Neues in Spring Data 2.0? <[[https://jax.de/serverside-enterprise-java/was-gibts-neues-in-spring-data-2-0/]]> - JVM Data Access Experts Panel <[[https://jax.de/core-java-jvm-languages/jvm-data-access-experts-panel/]]> - Spring Boot and Spring Cloud on Pivotal Application Service <[[https://jax.de/microservices/spring-boot-spring-cloud-on-pivotal-application-service/]]>
Click here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/jax-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-jax-germany-q218]]> for the latest in Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry. Stay in touch with the Spring Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalDACH]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-jax-germany-q218]]>!
Sincerely, Pivotal and The Spring Team
